title: [SOLVED] 820-2879-B   power on but  just beep every 5 seg,  no chime, video,  green light
message:
[PLAIN][SOLVED] 820-2879-B   power on but  just beep every 5 seg,  no chime, video,  green light[/PLAIN]

Hi I got this one today  water damage (cofe juice)who know,  no green light,  check I have short to ground in F7040 fuse out,   apply 12v to short side,  u7000 got  hot  remplace,  short gone  green light up, ppbus_g3h up, fan spin  nice and clean and finger lol  the shit turn on but video no crime no nothing  just beep every 5 seg like memory error I check  u7300 is no hot able to read 0.75 and 1.5v for memory  check cpu vcore  1.15v  mpc vcore 0.89 and I m freezzz lol  any idea  thank you

title: [SOLVED] 820-2879-B   power on but  just beep every 5 seg,  no chime, video,  green light
message: Measure resistance to ground on L6995 and diode mode red probe to ground and black probe on each pin from Y2815.....  Report values....

title: [SOLVED] 820-2879-B   power on but  just beep every 5 seg,  no chime, video,  green light
message:
red probe to ground  .320           black probe to ground .770       both side  l9695

pin1 .847
pin2  open
pin3 .783
pin4  open
y2815    red probe to ground

message:

[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 7298"]

1.- Measure [COLOR=#FF0000]resistance[/COLOR] to ground on L6995
2.- Diode mode, red probe to ground and black probe on each pin from [COLOR=#FF0000]Y2815[/COLOR].....

Report values....[/QUOTE]

Does it beep without memory???

one beep every 5 seg until shut down  or manual turn off,  I changed the c6990 because look funny after that  turn on  the screen one time  no crime  after that same beep  again
